sections.content:
**Welcome to the Crypto Campus** <:emoji_2:1138417639874637896> 

The following channels will teach you the **basics of crypto, how to trade, and how to invest. ** <:rocket:1117268022084767795> 

Every single channel has its purpose, so we recommend completing the crypto channels **before** you start following our calls.

This channel will tell you our current **investing** positions 👉🏽 <#1075430184309751860>

This channel will tell you our daily **trading** analysis 👉🏽 <#1075432486705827982>

You will soon complete our **Crypto Masterclass** which will turn you and anybody who listens to our calls into a money making machine. <:stonks_up:1130228305187053568> 

Note - Crypto trading has higher risk than crypto investing, but trading also has a higher upside potential. Regardless you **WILL** make money inside this campus whether you decide to go with **investing or trading.** 

Start our **Crypto Lessons** and complete the **Masterclass.** 👉🏽 <#1143365275656405013> 

***P.S.*** Once inside the channel scroll to the very top to begin. To save your progress right click or hold down on mobile to then copy the message link. That link will save your progress, so make sure to keep it safe.

__**Unlock more Crypto Signals by completing more lessons.**__

<@&1137731034755108896>
Recommended Education Pathway; A.K.A 'The Campus Map'
